channel.title: Web Security on Vaishnav Baraskar
channel.description: Recent content in Web Security on Vaishnav Baraskar

item.title: The Anatomy of a Clickjacking Vulnerability: A Trello Deep Dive
item.description: An exploration of a clickjacking vulnerability found in Trello’s public boards, examining the technical details, potential impacts, and broader security lessons about proper header configurations.

item.title: "PetCare" – CSRF in the Admin Panel: When One Click Made You an Admin
item.description: A simple POST request without CSRF protection allowed me to trick a PetCare admin into granting me admin privileges. This writeup dives into the exploitation steps, mental process, root cause, and patching of a high-risk vulnerability in their internal panel.
